greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A000217(A230404(n+1)); the first differences of A219650.
comment: Construction: Count the trailing zeros in the factorial base representation (A007623) of 2n+2 (2, 4, 6, 8, ...) and then take the corresponding triangular number from A000217.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10079
xref: First differences of A219650. Can be used to compute A219650 and A230412. Cf. also A230413.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 31 2013
